text:
Virginia Leith (October 15, 1925 – November 4, 2019) was an American actress. She was known for her leading roles in "On the Threshold of Space", "Toward the Unknown", "Violent Saturday" and "A Kiss Before Dying".
She dated actor Marlon Brando in 1956. Leith died on November 4, 2019 at the age of 94.
